description.raw:
The z component of Vector3 elements parsed from urdf always contains 3.80985e+180 (FLT_MAX) because of an illegal index in parser_urdf.cc:255.

Vector3 elements are used internally for the model origin when spawning URDF models. gzclient crashes with the following error message directly after the model is spawned:


```
gzclient: /build/buildd/ogre-1.7.4/OgreMain/include/OgreAxisAlignedBox.h:252: void Ogre::AxisAlignedBox::setExtents(const Ogre::Vector3&, const Ogre::Vector3&): Assertion `(min.x <= max.x && min.y <= max.y && min.z <= max.z) && "The minimum corner of the box must be less than or equal to maximum corner"' failed.
```
description.html:
The z component of Vector3 elements parsed from urdf always contains 3.80985e+180 (FLT_MAX) because of an illegal index in parser_urdf.cc:255.

Vector3 elements are used internally for the model origin when spawning URDF models. gzclient crashes with the following error message directly after the model is spawned:

gzclient: /build/buildd/ogre-1.7.4/OgreMain/include/OgreAxisAlignedBox.h:252: void Ogre::AxisAlignedBox::setExtents(const Ogre::Vector3&, const Ogre::Vector3&): Assertion `(min.x <= max.x && min.y <= max.y && min.z <= max.z) && "The minimum corner of the box must be less than or equal to maximum corner"' failed.

title.raw: Fixed parsing of Vector3 from strings in URDF parser
title.html: Fixed parsing of Vector3 from strings in URDF parser
